GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:id.description: serves an article by ID number

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for a given article by ID number

POST /api/articles/:id/comments.description: posts a comment to an article with a given ID
